name: Screen9 Video Integration
author: Adeprimo

sections.description:
*This plugin was created by Adeprimo to give customers an easy to use tool for uploading and displaying Screen9 video content on worpress sites.

Screen9 is an Online Video Platform, or in other words, a platform for publishing video online.

To be able to use the plugin you need to have an account over at Screen9. To try it out for free, go to: Link

Requirements

  • WordPress version >= 3.0
  • PHP version >= 5.2
  • Modern web browser
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin via the WordPress.org plugin directory.
  2. Go to settings -> Settings Screen9 in wp-admin and fill in your credentials
  3. To display video your single-article template/content.php must implement the function screen9_display_video(get_post_meta( get_the_ID(), ‘screen9_videoid’, true ));

short_description: This plugin allows uploading and displaying Screen9 video content
